website_summaries.verdict: Deeper sections and a unique design for less mess than some other baby plates.
pros: Doesn't stain like some other silicone plates
Has deeper sections for less mess
cons: Some buyers note that the suction seems to weaken over time

customer_reviews.title: Suction is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This thing is terrible. The quality of the plate is nice but it doesn’t actually suction to a counter top at all. Very disappointed especially given the price point. Watch the video to see what I mean
customer_reviews.author: Boomer and Brinkley

customer_reviews.title: Does not suction well
customer_reviews.text: I definitely don’t recommend this item if you’re getting it for the suction part. It was on my daughters tray for less than five seconds and she knew exactly how to get it off, all she does is pull on it .. The product itself is very high-quality and an overall really good place but have to give it one star because the reason I got it was for the suction. I posted a video of how easily she got it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyne Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Retains foul odors after washing
customer_reviews.text: The silicone in these plates is porous, and traps food residue. The plates retain foul food and dish detergent odors after washing, which are then transferred into my toddler's meals. The foul taste is worse with warmer foods. It's quite disgusting. I bought these plates because of the many 4 and 5 star reviews here, and I'm afraid that these parents aren't tasting their kids' food before serving. I bought two of these and threw them out. I'm trying plastic plates with rubber suction instead.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- food smells and tastes like plastic
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this product. Recently tasted my toddlers food and it was so plasticky. Just trying one morsel of rice already gave me that horrible taste. I am left feeling so guilty that I may have been feeding my child toxic chemicals. I don’t believe that this is child safe as it’s not possible that a food safe item would make food smell and taste so bad. I have not ever placed this in a microwave or dishwasher etc.. and have only had this item for less than 3 months. How can this be sold for babies!?!????!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great plate for baby
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned this because it wasn't suctioning and my son was able to pick it right up, but then I realized I was trying to put it too close to the edge of his tray, now that we've got that figured out he can't move it at all. If you put tomato sauce in it the plate will stain but it comes off after a few washes anyway. I love this plate and use it 3 times a day every day. Super easy to clean and does exactly what I want it to!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival the Batman dish did not stick to my child’s high chair as advertised. The suction did not work. In addition, I washed it in the dishwasher on the top rack per the instructions and it came out with a white residue all over it. Photo is attached. Very disappointed. It was a cute and sturdy plate but will unfortunately be returned
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Mama

customer_reviews.title: We love this tray so much we got a second
customer_reviews.text: We love this tray so much we got a second. We take it to restaurants with our 18m old. It sticks to most surfaces pretty well and is a good size with deep enough compartments. Also very easy to clean and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Rascoe

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Not 100% silicone! Silicone doesn't turn white when you bend it! This does! That means they added filler. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not too awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s not plastic and won’t shatter if it falls. It’s light and fits nice in the dishwasher. What I don’t like? The stupid thing won’t stick. It goes down and she quickly can pull it right up 🤦🏼‍♀️ I also found the way to get it to stick easier to the tray is to put the rounded side toward her vs flat side.
customer_reviews.author: HillaryL

customer_reviews.title: Sticks firmly to smooth surface and good for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this grip dish, as it sticks firmly to my babies high chair and she is not able to pull it off (yet, haha!) She is currently nine months old and is exploring the world of food. The dish is a good size with nicely sized compartments for different foods for her to try. The grey/white marble background makes the foods stand out and so far, does not stain easily. It is easy to wash or pop into your dishwasher. It is also nice to pack up when you and baby are on the go!
customer_reviews.author: TheGummyMummy

customer_reviews.title: Child's food tastes like soap
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the tray is what I expected except that twice I have tried my daughter's food from the tray and it tasted like soap. I stopped using these trays in the dishwasher the first time it happened and it still tastes like soap since I've been washing by hand. I noticed because my daughter wasn't eating as much as usual and would try and push the tray away, but she was still hungry for our food. I am disappointed because I am not sure if I will be able to use them anymore, and I have only had them a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Nye

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this plate. I like this kind much better than the ones attached to a placemat. Very good quality and heavy so even on the rare occasion it comes unattached, my son doesn't pick it up and throw it because it doesn't slide around. Taking off one star because it tends to really absorb food smells. We use this for nearly every meal and it's well loved but that is a bit of an issue. I now spray it down with vinegar water after washing and let it air dry. This helps a lot but doesn't completely eliminate the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Casey W.

customer_reviews.title: Retains soap residue. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a year, I finally realized that the soap taste in my sons food is not from us washing these dishes incorrectly, but due to absorption of soap into the dishes. No matter how we clean these, by dishwasher or hand, by Dawn or Palmolive, they impart a very obvious soap taste on my son’s food. I feel awful that I didn’t make this connection sooner. We don’t microwave these or really do anything out of the ordinary but hand wash them, and they are still causing food to taste extremely soapy. This is terrible. They are going into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to plastic plates for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for non-plastic dishes for my 20 month old. I also want to be able to put them in the dishwasher, which is why I chose this one. First, I will say that the "grip" on the bottom is flat, so it doesn't suction like other brands. However, combined with the heaviness of the plate, it does help to keep it from sliding around a plastic high chair tray. I like that it is sectioned, and the sections are deep enough that most of my daughters food stays in when she is using a spoon or fork. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Lingering taste always on the plate
customer_reviews.text: This silicone plate has residual taste on it. No matter how much I wash it. The oil from previous meals stick to it and it won't leave. I tried to boil it. Soak it. It just taints every meal bc I can taste a lingering taste. I contacted Bumkins and they had amazing customer service. Unfortunately, the problem keeps happening (even though I do not microwave it) so I've given up. I'm going to just use bamboo from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Hippiehoff

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our granddaughter to use with our antique wooden high chair (used by me when I was a child). It does NOT have any suction power whatsoever! I was so disappointed when she pulled it off during its first use. She had no trouble pulling it loose - and kept doing it over and over again. It was a total waste of money. It does not serve the purpose for which I bought it. Totally disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MAKNelson

customer_reviews.title: Sub-par
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! I thought this would solve our problems of toddler dinner time troubles, but it did not. At first, it definitely discouraged our child but after a few seconds of prying, she really released the suction and the plate went flying. We still use it because it definitely slows her down and we can usually get to her before she launches her dish off the high chair, however it did not meet our expectations. We are wondering if ours is defective? The other reviews were so good so we had such high hopes, but this dish is nothing special. Major bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: On the Floor in 10-seconds.
customer_reviews.text: Easy for babies to flip this on to the floor. The suction cup is fully exposed !!! The plate is like a giant "grab me" frisbee ... it's even elevated off the top of the table or high-chair to allow easy grab-access. And the entire plate rocks back-forth because it is elevated. Babies are smarter than they look. haha The color is nice. There is a much better product design solution from Nummy ... you can't even see their suction cup and their bowl lies flat on the table so it is 100% stable.
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small, but love the design
customer_reviews.text: Ok so here is the thing, I love the design of this and the suction is good. However, it is smaller than some other suction plates and my 18 month old eats like she is a wild animal. She is a BIG eater so I have to continue to refill the plate as she eats which isn't ideal if I want to be multitasking. Because the sections are on the small side, it does make it slightly harder to hand wash (I usually do since we use the plates more often than we can run the dishwasher). Overall, love the design, just wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: the true suction power of this plate
customer_reviews.text: I loved this plate! Don’t get me wrong the quality is great and an amazing plate. It’s tricky because a lot of people say the suction is not good but the truth is that it depends of the materials the surface has to be clear of food residue and as flat as possible, it doesn’t work good on wood, but granite, plastic, or ikea supper flat surfaces are great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like them! We needed to move on to plates as my one year olds are growing and eating more food, so these are perfect for letting them see all of their food and separating what they are eating. They seem to have an easy enough time using their utensils to get the food, but it does spill over the sides fairly easily. The suction on the high chair tray is just ok, they suction to everything else very well though (countertops, table, etc). Clean up super easy in the dishwasher, so overall a good purchase and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like them! We needed to move on to plates as my one year olds are growing and eating more food, so these are perfect for letting them see all of their food and separating what they are eating. They seem to have an easy enough time using their utensils to get the food, but it does spill over the sides fairly easily. The suction on the high chair tray is just ok, they suction to everything else very well though (countertops, table, etc). Clean up super easy in the dishwasher, so overall a good purchase and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: At first, this plate was a blessing. It suctioned fairly well to my child’s test and was perfect for our portions, etc. But none of it is worth the soap taste this plate takes on. At first, I was lured by the fact that I could microwave this plate, but I rarely ever needed a whole plate heated. And again, EVERYTHING YOU PUT IN IT EVENTUALLY TASTES LIKE SOAP. My son stopped eating anything that went in this plate. We got new Munchkin plates and saved this as a back up. Just put something in it after not using it for 6 months. NOT WORTH IT. Throwing this plate out. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because one my mommy groups on Facebook raved about it and its suction power. My son however, removes it from his highchair chair with ease. I'm talking within seconds. He is barely a year old. No matter how clean and smooth the plate and surface are, it will not stick. I'm severely let down because at his age, I need suction to keep the plate on the tray and I had such high hopes for this buy. I love the portion cubbies and how easy it is to clean but as a whole, I'm a bit let down.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: NOW FOOD NOT BRUSHED AWAY AFTER MEAL .
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is a healthy eater but when finished he takes his arms and brushes every thing to floor . Our dog loves this but not grandma . He just turned one and uses hands to eat . Not patient enough to wait for us to spoon in . Tried rubber mat but he also picks that up . Found this dish . Works like a charm . Suction great . If he works at it i'm sure he could lift it but gives us time to notice he is done eating . Dog still gets some of his food but not near enough she wants .
customer_reviews.author: factfilter

customer_reviews.title: Great suction cup, but food tastes like soap!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was happy with this product. It stays in place which was the whole reason I bought this product. Suction cup at the bottom works really well. You can throw it in a dishwasher to wash it. It was great up until recently when I actually tasted food served on this plate. FOOD TASTES LIKE SOAP on this plate. I tried so hard to get rid of smell and taste of soap but nothing works. Any food you serve on this plate will taste like soap. I am extremely disappointed since otherwise, this is a great plate. I can't recommend this product especially since it's for my little guy!
customer_reviews.author: CYNV

customer_reviews.title: Great pattern, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We really like this dish for our toddler. It's durable, easy to clean, and the pattern is really lovely. It's hard to find anything that isn't obnoxiously bright or characterized. All that being said, my toddler totally knows how to unstick the suction. Bummer! It would help if it didn't have a flat side for him to slip his fingers under, but honestly, he'd be able to slip his fingers under even the slightest underhang. I'm still glad I bought it and would buy it again! Love the compartments, ease of cleaning, and pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi7002

customer_reviews.title: Suction is horrible - would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: It seems like good quality silicone but u fortunately the suction is horrible. My baby can lift up the entire plate (and matching bowl) without any effort. Given that was the main reason I purchased these items it’s a big disappointment as I could have easily paid much less for a regular plate/bowl set. I have purchased a much cheaper silicone bowl with suction that was great (although the silicone was not as thick as the bumpkin). Unfortunately they have been out of stock. Would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: hulabug

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. DOES NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not even going to bother with pics or a video. Look at all the ones others have posted. My wife wanted this and ordered it. I should have gone over the reviews. The suction DOES NOT WORK. I recieved this today and I've started the return process today. I have a 1 yr old. I cleaned, dried and stuck to highchair table. He pulled it right off and dumped food everywhere. I tried again without food, and again and again. Same result. I even tried wetting the suction and that didn't do anything either. It's a nice idea but needs better suction or another way easily attach to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. And Mrs. Guerin

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her own plates
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my daughter. She gets to have her own special plates and has learned to associate the plates with sitting down with mom and dad to eat a meal. She enjoys mixing her foods across the dividers, and the suction power is enough to keep things from sliding around too much. The only problem is if she is full before we are--trying to rip it from her table and sending leftovers soaring through the air is oftentimes too tempting a proposition to resist, but we've been working on her table manners anyways.
customer_reviews.author: BrynnFlynn

customer_reviews.title: Love the weight of this plate too
customer_reviews.text: This dish is a lifesaver! My almost 2 year old has a real obsession with swatting his food everywhere. No matter what dish we used or what kind of surface we served his food on, he'd want to dump it on the floor and swat it all around (and then proceed to eat it!). For some reason, with this dish he is perfectly content to eat his food right from the plate. No more mess! Love the weight of this plate too, makes it really hard for him to slide it on the table.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyTop Contributor: Children's Books

customer_reviews.title: Better than those giant placemats!
customer_reviews.text: We own two of these. Will be buying more. They stay in better than those giant silicon placements that seem to be popular right now, are easier to wash, and take up less room in general. Easy for baby (now toddler) to self feed from with fingers and utensils
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Genius! Great suction!
customer_reviews.text: This dish is GREAT. I’m super impressed how the suction held on my wood table! My 16 month old daughter can not pull it off. I like how it’s deep enough to put soup in the small section (I tried, but she only splashed her hands in it!) And, although I didn’t think much of it at first, it’s GENIUS that they kept one edge straight so you can push the seat right up against the plate. I’m only disappointed in the price, I would have bought two together if it was less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This bowl puts a big smile on my little ones face
customer_reviews.text: So far we’ve really only used the bowl. My little one gets so excited when he sees the bowl because he knows he’ll get to eat solids :) it’s really cute so I like that affect the bowl has. The suction function is so strong it’s awesome you really need to lift that tiny flap in order to get the bowl from wherever you placed it. Sometimes the food stains the bowl but luckily it washes of which is great. We are happy with this bowl
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: It's Mickey, so that's cool...
customer_reviews.text: The suction power was okay. The portion size was meh.... was expecting bigger due to the photos. It's fairly easy to clean, but the tiny ear holes are a little more difficult due to how small they are. But hey, it's Mickey and that's my son's "theme," so Idk. It's is not worth the price tag. Just know you are paying the price for it being Mickey. Nothing anymore special than other silicone suction dishes you can get for lower prices elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t actually suction!
customer_reviews.text: I like the heft and size of this but the whole purpose of it was for it to suction to the table so the toddler doesn’t pick up the plate and toss it’s contents all over the floor and himself..... complete failure. It took him less than a minute to figure out how to easily slide the plate to the edge of the table and boom he has a projectile plate. The suction bottom is useless. Maybe it needs multiple smaller suction cups instead but one large suction cup just doesn’t work. This was a waste of $ for me I’ll never use this plate again
customer_reviews.author: SDXicana

customer_reviews.title: No more flying food!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only 'suction' plate we've found that actually sticks and fits on the high chair's tray. She has tried to fling this one around and failed! All of the others release with a pop that tosses the food everywhere. It goes in the dishwasher and hasn't been stained by any foods. In all, it is a sturdy little plate. Too heavy to consider carrying one around in the diaper bag though...
customer_reviews.author: Suzy's Owner

customer_reviews.title: this stays in place while she eats with her good hand and arm
customer_reviews.text: my mom had a stroke and I needed something that would stay put so she could eat by herself. this stays in place while she eats with her good hand and arm. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Balinda Pegram

customer_reviews.title: Suctions and does it's job well.
customer_reviews.text: We love these plates for our 14-month-old daughters. These plates suction so well we haven't used some other plates we have for our girls. This light blue color is actually pretty vibrant. The 3 compartments are pretty roomy. There is a tab to help lift the plates and decrease suction. Our girls have figured out how to do this themselves, but they usually don't do it unless they are goofing off. Overall I would recommend this product and we are actually looking to get more as well as purchase the covers for these.
customer_reviews.author: 2winShopMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for special needs children
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this bowl, and loves it! He is only able to use one hand to eat, and the other has issues keeping the plate on the table. This eliminates the problem of having to hold the bowl. He can eat independently!
customer_reviews.author: Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Baby tested and throw proof
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what magic they added to this but it is EASY to clean. I also just throw it in the dishwasher (top rack) all the time. It stays suctioned down as long as it’s clean under. Yeah. You gotta clean off those cheerio crumbs. Using this for my 9 month old but I’m sure we will be using it for a long time. I’m not sure how my 9 month old feels. He likes to throw it on the floor. So that’s not fun. But he does what he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: finally!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY love it! we've finally found a suction plate that our LO can't pick up! He has tried but hasn't' succeeded (at least not yet-he's about 1 year old) He's going through that throwing stage and learning to eat with his spoon. The round edges allows him to keep his food in his plate and scoop it up! We mostly use it on our kitchen island or his high chair table surface.
customer_reviews.author: A Fig

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The dish sticks very well to our high hair tray. As with any plastic, Soli once, rubber etc. dish, it is important that when you clean it to use a wet sponge or cloth to remove and oils left behind by food before putting it in the dishwasher or before you rinse and dry it if washing by hand. If you don’t, the oil will stick to it and the dish will stay dirty.
customer_reviews.author: tondria sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old was flipping her plate over constantly. This plate was just what I needed. Depending on the surface it does stick better to some surfaces but we’ve used for her high chair (plastic), coffee table (stained wood) and outside patio table (glass) and it’s been great and stays in place. I’ve even had to remove it for my mother-in-law because she can’t get it off. Portion sizes are still great even at 15 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lakkiada

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: We love these plates! They are like the perfect plate for our toddler. We’ve been using them since about 8 months. The portion sizes are perfect. She can move the plate on her high chair tray though. It stays stuck but mobile so it can’t be lifted but def moved. I would say the only fault I’ve found with them is that the marble color stained a bit with red pasta sauce but very very lightly.
customer_reviews.author: Claadizzy

customer_reviews.title: More of a novelty item than a “suction” bowl
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun and cute for any Batman fan who wants to share with their toddler. However, it’s more of a novelty. The suction is a OK but any toddler can easily pull it up. I find this the issue with any toddler suction bowl. Overall good quality and it is a fun gift to give. Portion sizes are good for a toddler. Materials are easy to clean and it’s dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Cute dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Super cute. Suction is decent but not great. Also the little tag to pull up to release the suction is on the side facing the toddler. Engineering fail there guys! So you have to turn the dinosaur around to prevent the kid from flipping the bowl. My toddler figured it out in less than two minutes. You have to really wash it well to make sure you’ve gotten all the food off of it.
customer_reviews.author: NerdyMom850

customer_reviews.title: Ok suction, quality material and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, sticks great to my marble countertop but doesn't have the greatest suction to the high chair tray, but I haven't found a plate yet that does. It works overall and is very well made, dishwasher safe and makes it easy for toddlers to scoop food both with their and when they start to use utensils. Overall a good purchase and I plan to get a few more.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleM

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this bowl. It feels so good I want to sleep next to it. My baby loves chewing on it whenever he finds it unsuctioned. He can't unsuction it himself though, even though he's a huge and strong 9 months old. The spoon is fine. I thought he'd be more into chewing the paddle end, but whatever. Super easy to clean. I've microwaved it a number of times. Overall great purchase, no complains.
customer_reviews.author: oplap

customer_reviews.title: Did not suction to high chair
customer_reviews.text: So overall this was great I'm theory. The fiance loved the Batman design that he is forcing onto our son!! (Haha) however the suction feature was the sole purpose of buying this. And well...my 1 year old gets it off every time I put it in front of him. Even when stuck to the high chair and I lean it to the side it will move down the high chair tray. Although if u attempt to move it, it feels stuck. Not sure what the issue is minus maybe needing a larger suction. Besides that we do love it. Perfect portion sizes and 3 separate compartments for several foods!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy K

customer_reviews.title: Portions good but suction disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I like how these plates have deep edges and nice portions but the suction power is disappointing.... it only stays suctioned for a extremely short time (10-30 seconds) before my son has lifted the plate off his highchair dumping any food that was on the plate all over. I have tried making sure the highchair tray is clean and wetting the suction part of the plate but this still doesn’t help a whole lot. It was a waste of money spending this much on one plate.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It’s good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good suctioning. Wish it was a bit better but that’s probably never going to happen as long as you have toddlers who want nothing more than to remove that sucker from the surface. Maybe you’ll at least 6.5 minutes of eating in before the lil babe can successfully remove the dish and throw food everywhere when you’re not watching. It’s better than the cheeper brands though.
customer_reviews.author: gnreed

customer_reviews.title: Must-have plate!
customer_reviews.text: We started using this a few months ago for our now-15-month-old. I love this plate! It is so easy to clean with soap and water. I love the high walls so she can get food onto her utensils easier. Sticks very well to the tray on her high chair. She can get it off if she wants to but I don't think that's completely avoidable after reading lots of reviews on suction bowls/plates. I am extremely happy with my purchase, I just wish they would be a little less expensive, but I think this is the best product out there and it's worth it to me!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Miller

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite plate
customer_reviews.text: Me (and my son) absolutely love the Pooh dish. It is the perfect size for him and is slightly smaller in circumference than the divided plate version so it fits nicely on his Fisher Price booster seat tray, whereas the divided plate is ever so slightly too big. The suction is also great and of course being silicone it is easy to clean for the next meal!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Fun, and Stays Put!
customer_reviews.text: Looove this plate so much! I purchased the adorable dinosaur for our daughter, and it arrived just in time for dinner! :) I think it’s great for realistic toddler portion sizes, and when she tried to pull it off her tray... It didn’t budge! I swear she ate better than when we use the Munchkin suction bowls, too. Absolutely worth the price, and better than the Nuby brand silicone, divided placemat that Grandma tried from Target. Purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hovland

customer_reviews.title: We now have three
customer_reviews.text: We liked the first one we bought so much, that we bought 2 more! They fit on our stokke high chair and stay sectioned usually until the end of the meal. We are lucky in that our 15-month-old just tries to lift it off the tray after it's empty. We just give it a rinse and throw it in the dishwasher and it comes out perfectly clean.
customer_reviews.author: MissY

customer_reviews.title: Great for us
customer_reviews.text: We love these plates for our 11 month old. Depending on angle of your high chair, the sides may be a little deep for your baby to see into them. My son has to lean forward sometimes to see into the compartments but it keeps food within them well. We pop it into the top rack of the dishwasher and it's good to go. They do slide around a little if you don't apply enough pressure to the middle when setting them down but I also have an extremely strong and determined little one that always tries to get his suctioned items unstuck.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Plate did not suction well to top of Fisher Price high chair tray so tried setting up high chair at table instead and suctioning plate to top of table. 1 1/2 year old grandson picked it righ up and turned it over, certainly not what I was hoping for. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: retiredRN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with great suction
customer_reviews.text: I love this plate! I have Munchkin and Nuby plates already that stuck to my counters, but do not stick to my son's high chair. As soon as I took this plate out of the box I loved the quality. It is very sturdy and larger in size than our Munchkin sectioned plate. I had little faith that this would actually hold to his high chair since NOTHING else has, but it did! I am ordering another one after just the first use because I am so impressed. I also purchased the lid, which is okay, but I am not nearly impressed with it as it is just a floppy piece that pulls over the top of the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Casey C

customer_reviews.title: Would totally buy another
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly impressed with the plate. The weight is substantial definitely doesn't feel cheap. The suction seems to work great so far. Don't get my wrong if my 1 year old really really wanted this plate on the ground he'd figure it out, but overall I would definitely buy again. Also washes great in the dishwasher (top rack)
customer_reviews.author: Bethrawks

customer_reviews.title: I Gift These at Baby Showers
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of those items that I feel like everyone needs. I found my first one at a Mom's Baby Shower Expo. I loved it so much that I ended up buying this one on Amazon. They are exact same quality and I really appreciate the suction to avoid mess. I have now gifted this twice to people for baby shower gifts (in addition to a few other things! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jami ValkosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best baby plate ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby plate! My twins use it for every meal. It sticks to the table well enough that they cannot pick it up to fling across the room The plate will accommodate portions for a child up to 3 or 4 years of age. I ordered "red" and was dark pink as I hoped and expected. These are extremely easy to clean and do not hold onto smells or colors from food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I really love this little plate. The portion sizing is perfect and it’s so easy to clean. The silicone also helps prevent food from sticking too bad If you haven’t had the chance to get to it right away. The suction power is very good, however with a little work my clever little girl can figure it out and have it ripped off that table if she’s willing to work for it enough. I’ve bought two of these so far and will continue to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Anpolidan

customer_reviews.title: BEST ON THE MARKET.
customer_reviews.text: This little beauty washes up in the dishwasher like a dream, does not stain (with spaghetti sauce or blueberries) sticks well to the high chair tray and the portions are perfect. We love it, the granddaughter loves it, why didn't they make em like this years ago? I highly recommended you buy this particular manufacturer. You get your money's worth and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: EL SaVaje

customer_reviews.title: Great suction!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this dish for a couple weeks now and just over the weekend tried the Munchkin suction bowls... man, I had been taking the suction for granted on this dish! Oatmeal everywhere from the Munchkin bowl. Overall great product. Easy to clean (pop it in the dishwasher on the top rack), easy to use, good portion sizes. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: The suction is strong but easy to come off and the portions are great. My daughter loves to push her food away when she's done which made our dog happy (and full). Now, she can't push the plate and it saves us a mess! The color hasn't faded and the suction works just as well when we take out of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: LSC

customer_reviews.title: The suction is not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7month baby. I hope the suction of this plate is good so my baby can eat the food, not throw the food everywhere. But I was disappointed at the suction. My baby can easily remove it from high chair no matter how I put it tightly. The good point is that it is easy to clean and my baby like this color.
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: The plate is great but the suction bottom is no match to my baby.
customer_reviews.text: I like this plate for going out to eat with my daughter. It is easy to stick down on any table and feed her and helps keep the table reasonably clean. The suction on the bottom isn’t that strong and it can slide around or be lifted pretty easily. It’s better than nothing but when we’re at home I usually just feed her right on the high chair tray.
customer_reviews.author: sister midnight

customer_reviews.title: Puts up a fight
customer_reviews.text: Although it's not 100% stick proof, it does the job. My toddler is a very messy eater and when he is done eating he helps mommy out by turning his plate upside down and throwing everything on the floor with his hands. This plate can put up a fight so it's not that easy for him to knock it down from the table. However, my little one likes a challenge so he tugs and tugs until he can pop it off. Overall, it at least stays on until he is done eating once I see him tugging on it, I know he is done. This prevents him from spilling his breakfast/lunch/dinner on the floor sooner than he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Aqua24

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for dining out
customer_reviews.text: We love this dish for our 1-year old. At home, we use this to prepare him for his upcoming transition to the toddler room at daycare, since he'll need to be used to eating from tableware and not sending it flying across the room. (We also use more traditional bowls to support this, but we began with this one.) The best thing about this dish, though, is it's size--we can easily take this with us to a restaurant where it suctions to a smooth tabletop, and our son can sample foods from our plates and we can relax knowing he won't send china crashing to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: 0leo

customer_reviews.title: Great portion size for kids
customer_reviews.text: 3 years later and this thing is still in great shape. The suction is pretty handy when it came to teaching my son how to eat and needed it to stay in place. Portion size is great for little kids as it doesn't hold much more than what they need. Cleans easily and pretty durable. Wish the suction would hold on more but still does the job pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: The One

customer_reviews.title: No more mess!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it at dinner last night and it worked great! My 16 month old son likes to throw his plate when he’s almost or done his food and we’ve been trying to teach him not to do it. So we decided to purchase this suction plate and he tried to throw it last night and he couldn’t get it off the table! We did have to buy a silicone mat though because it won’t stick to our wooden table as it is not a smooth table. But we are very happy with the product and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a super small high chair and tray stand. Plate fits perfect with enough room for his sippy cup. Easy to wash and suctions well but my 13 month can still take it off of his tray. Will be buying more. Love it! UPDATE: He's now 16 months and no longer trys to pull the plate off of his tray. So the suction is perfect to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Really good toddler plate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her plate. She literally asks for it. It's nice and heavy, study, has a lot of room, and the suction cup is huge. You won't be able to prevent "them" from popping it off the table because toddlers are clever lol but unless they get their little fingernails under the suction cup, it's not going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ligia P

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no suction
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was cute and thought from the reviews the suction would be adequate. There is absolutely no suction whatsoever. My then 13month old could easily lift it and dump all the food out with no effort. Disappointed. Gave it two stars because it's cute. But negative stars for suction.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ko

customer_reviews.title: Great Dish
customer_reviews.text: There's quite a few of these suction plates available out there, but we particularly like that this one has a flat edge so it can be pushed right up against the edge of the high chair table instead of the ones that are just round. The suction cup holds well and our twin boys haven't been able to lift them yet cutting down on messes.
customer_reviews.author: pony

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for meals with toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for meals with toddler!! We've replaced most of our purees with real food and needed something babe wouldn't hurl across the room. This suctions well to our high chair tray, counter, table, restaurant table and it's easy for us to remove but babe can't regardless of how hard she tries. The color is beautiful. Packaging was a little damaged when I received it, but plate itself was fine and requires a good cleaning anyway. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SHSTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great at the table
customer_reviews.text: Great dish only lost a star because it’s too big to suction on the tray of the Abiie Beyond Y high chair. If I remove the tray and slide the little one up to the table the dish works great, excellent suction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad suction but works if your kid doesn’t pull on it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, easy to clean and great size. The suction on this is not strong at all. My daughter rips this up within seconds and has been since she was about 8 months old. My daughter still likes to use this but I hate food flying everywhere, thankful for a pup who likes to eat all the floor food.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Keeps from flipping food .
customer_reviews.text: The suction doesn’t adhere to my kitchen table which sucks but it does work on the kiddie table my daughter isn’t able to pull it off so that’s a plus. Keeps me from having to clean up so much food from the floor. it’s pretty easy to wash I should’ve ordered more than one to cut down on washing several times a day
customer_reviews.author: Allthingsrayrayk

customer_reviews.title: Absorb soap and difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: The suction on these are great.. so great we own four of them for our toddler. I was noticing though that he wasn’t finishing some of his favorite foods when they were serve on them. I tried the Mac and cheese and it tasted of soap. I had been washing them on the top rack of our dishwasher. I was annoyed at the idea of hand washing them but, because they work so well (and we had already invested in them) I committed to hand washing them... they continue to retain the soap regardless of rinsing extensively. I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ewcrow

customer_reviews.title: Great suction. Great dish.
customer_reviews.text: Love this dish! I have a 8 month old who is baby led weaning and it’s perfect it grips to my Eddie Bauer high chair perfectly and I’m sure I’ll get great use out of this plate for when he’s older because the grip makes the plate very stable. The only thing is I wish they made a mini version of this for babies because it is a bit big for my 8 month old but we make do!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: No suction!!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this bowl considering the bumkins plates are amazing. Unfortunately, there is NO suction. The bottom potion is flat, almost inverted, I’m assuming this is why there is no suction. Material is great and the size is great it’s just worthless for 2+ years because I can’t trust my son to not flip it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this plate so much I bought 3 of them! Now I regret my decision. The plate lasted us a few short weeks before starting to crack/break. It seemed like goo quality and we always hand washed it, but it just doesn't last. So disappointed and it's too late to return it
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Although my lil troublemaker has figured out how to unhinged this thing from his tray using a fork, this thing has still managed to be the grippiest of the grippy trays I've tried and does stuck really well and long enough to actually finish the meal. So yes I love this, might get another one since we use it for all his meals!
customer_reviews.author: SamSaKi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t put in dishwasher.  It will taste like soap.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but be very careful when you put it in the dishwasher. I wash it by hand because a few times I got lazy and I used a dishwasher and it comes out tasting like soap! I had to rinse it a LOT to get the soap taste out of it. I kept wondering why baby stopped eating. I tasted it, and it was horrible. I think the dishwasher soap sticks to the silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great plate for infants learning to self-feed
customer_reviews.text: Great plate for baby-led weaning. The size of each compartment is perfect for my infant. The suction is strong so my daughter (who loves to throw things) can’t pick it up and toss it. It stays in place well! The material is durable and not flimsy which is awesome. And it’s dishwasher safe, so it’s super easy to clean. Plus rinsing it off in the sink is also easy and works well. I’ll definitely be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley DaCosta

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few of these in hopes that my 20 month old would be unable to toss her plate at meals. Unfortunately, the suction was poor and she was easily able to pull these off her high chair. I wouldn’t recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleG

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This plate looks and works great. We've hand washed only to avoid the suction part drying out which is typical from using a dishwasher. I am unsure what other reviewers say about the plate acquiring a detergent smell, we have had zero issues with this with daily use for about six months.
customer_reviews.author: P. P.

customer_reviews.title: Box was opened and ripped
customer_reviews.text: Just received it but will be returning. Not only did the box the plate comes in came open but it was ripped along the edges, it seems as if someone else opened it and then returned it and they just put it right back in a packing slip and shipped it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the suction & it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The plate in itself is fine, I have no issue with it. I bought this for the suction & trusted the reviews, but my 15 year old pulled it off her tray immediately. When I pushed it down, it definitely does suction, but clearly not very well since she got it off so easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No match for 20 month olds
customer_reviews.text: Our 20 month old twins have entered the pick up, dump plate, and gleefully say "uh-oh" dinner phase. ALL the internet reviews said these bad boys would do the trick. I had high hopes. These plates are HEAVY. "This is it!" I thought as we sat down to dinner. It turns out our one daughter, 2nd percentile in weight for her age but 99th percentile in troublemaking, has no trouble pulling this off her tray or the table. It doesn't matter what we do to try to get it to stick, she will resort to summoning Hulk-like strength, forehead vein slightly popping, and remove the plate, causing a shower of chicken and green beans to come raining down. "Uh-oh" indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Black residue fresh out of the box!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this but that excitement quickly disappeared when this arrived. Upon arrival, I opened the amazon package to find the box was smashed and torn. I chalked this up to how it was treated during delivery. However, when I pulled the plate out of the box, it appeared to have some kind of black residue caked onto the bottom of the plate. I am so disgusted! **tried attaching photo but it’s not letting me**
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite Plates for Babies
customer_reviews.text: We love these plates by Bumkins. They can be lifted by our daughter, however they are probably the most challenging plates to lift for her to lift off the table or high chair than others we have tried. Because of the challenge, she doesn't try to lift them for very long and moves onto eating.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: It smells like soap
customer_reviews.text: I love it since I have been using it for more than half a year, but one day I tasted the food that I put in the dish for my toddler and it tasted like soap! I tried boiling the dish or putting it out under the sun but the soap smell just wouldn't go away. Saw other people's reviews on the soap taste as well. Now I'm just using plastic plates for my toddler instead. I love the dish but what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Decent- but not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more reviews before buying. The plate is heavy and sturdy but after 20 seconds my daughter pulled it off her high chair. I thought I didn’t push it down enough to stick so I did it again and she still is able to move it. While it does take her longer to do, it’s still not 100%. Also when putting tomato sauce, strawberries or anything that has the possibility of staining -it does and has to soak to get it off. Great idea and heavy but didn’t work for me. If you’re looking for a plate your baby cannot pick up and throw -keep looking. This isn’t it
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: It's Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this plate for my 10 month old but I use it for my 2 yr old who likes to turn plates upside down. The table/tray must be clean for the suction to work. I put the plate on the table and then I place the food on it. I will definitely be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jones & Mrs Jones

customer_reviews.title: its an alright product
customer_reviews.text: i like the serving size it can be from an infant like my son age 5 moths to a toddler. the spoons are great perfect size. and super soft due to the silicone i did not like this product because the suction is not strong enough my 5 month old baby was able to pull the bowl good thing that the food i fed him was a thick consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Used by my just turned 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these plates in different colors, two from the same seller and one from another. I would give these five stars, however I haven't had them long enough to warrant it yet (only about one month of use) . If they continue to hold up well then I'll come back and add in the star. I am very pleased with these plates so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shemarhof

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite plates!!!
customer_reviews.text: Besides cleaning every meal off the floor, I have no clue what we would do without these plates! They are probably my favorite purchase, and I recommend them to all moms getting ready to start BLW. We've had ours for over 6 months and have even bought a second and third set. They truly stick to the table, we have a real wood surface. We even packed these on vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bumkins Silicone Grip Dish, Suction Plate, Divided Plate, Baby Toddler Plate, BPA Free, Microwave Dishwasher Safe – Blue
product_meta.description: Style:Toddler| Size:1 Count| Color:Blue-GDBumkins Silicone Grip Dish is perfect for little ones learning to self-feed. The divided plate is perfectly sized for toddler portions. A strong suction base ensures the dish stays put – even with the most aggressive toddler! Great for use on highchair trays or tables. Silicone can withstand low and high temperatures, easily transitioning from the refrigerator or freezer to the oven or microwave. Made with 100% food safe silicone that’s durable, stain and bacteria resistant. Plus, it’s BPA-free, PVC-free, phthalate-free and lead-free. Oven safe up to 400°F/204°C. Dishwasher-safe (top rack). For ages 6 months and up. Measures approximately 8” across, 7” tall and 1” deep. Designed in Arizona, responsibly made in China.
feature_bullets: SELF FEEDING – Our Silicone Grip Dish is perfect for little ones learning to self-feed. The suction plate is perfectly sized for toddler portions. A strong suction base ensures the dish stays put – even with the most aggressive toddler. Great for use on highchair trays or tables. A straight side allows kids to belly up to the plate, allowing less of a mess.
PLATINUM CURED – Bumkins uses the highest quality curing process. It does not result in the creation of any by-products, ensuring you get the purest silicone.

SAFE TO USE – Silicone does not contain any petroleum-based plastics or toxic chemicals like those found in plastics. Our grip dishes are made from 100% food safe silicone, are BPA-free, PVC-free, phthalate-free and lead-free.
CONVENIENT – Silicone can withstand low and high temperatures, easily transitioning from the refrigerator or freezer to the oven or microwave. Oven safe up to 375°F. Top-rack dishwasher-safe.
BACTERIA RESISTANT – Silicone has a natural resistance to bacteria, making it safe and hygienic.
PINCH TESTS - There is a lot of information out there about “pinch tests” as a way to tell if silicone has fillers. However, the “pinch test” is not a real scientific test and, therefore unreliable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,314 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
